project1: GitTaur is a Git GUI built to take advantage of the speed and efficiency of Rust and the modern UX of React. How to run Currently, the app is in a very early stage, with a lot of bugs and missing core functionalites, but if you wish to run it either way, clone the repository, run npm install in the root folder and cargo build to download all the frontend and backend dependencies.
project2: A video game created in Unity that won 3rd prize at the 'CREATIVEJAM' game jam organized by uegamestudio in 2025. You will have to face the problems of intergalactic mobile authentication, abusive ads, cryptocurrency scams and the fear of talking to the person you like.
project3: A Java desktop application for Windows and Linux that allows you to play YouTube videos and playlists using 'yt-dlp', enabling you to avoid ads, fade out between videos, autoplay playlists, and organize the playback queue to your liking.
project4: Yet another Java desktop application for Windows that functions as a civic social network where residents of a neighborhood can report incidents and concerns about public roads, facilitating their direct management by public administrations and establishing an institutional-citizen communication channel.
